column4: Hm, nobody knows how to force 1024x768 @ 43Hz interlaced for a secondary monitor then? :(
are you sure you really want to have a monitor running at 1024x768 interlaced?
Well, it's the highest it can run... at 60Hz it shows scrolling video gibberish o.o;
but yeah, you should be able to tweak yourself a modeline to do that. i've never done itmyself. try googling around gfor x11 modeline orsomething
